bill_title: amend the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2002.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to amend the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2002. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That section 16 of chapter 3 of the 2001 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS State Penitentiary Operating Expenses, delete "$4,922,325" and insert "$5,215,825". Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. That section 17 of chapter 3 of the 2001 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES Developmental Disabilities Operating Expenses, delete "$21,481,272" and insert "$21,774,772" and delete $40,011,775" and insert "40,598,775". Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 3. Any expenditure authority or cash appropriated by this Act which are unspent at the end of fiscal year 2002 shall be carried over to fiscal year 2003. Section 4. That chapter 3 of the 2001 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: After Section 27, insert: "Section 27A. The state treasurer shall transfer to the general fund from the youth-at-risk fund the sum of three hundred ninety-six thousand dollars ($396,000). Section 27B. The state treasurer shall transfer to the general fund from the people's trust fund the sum of one hundred ninety-one thousand dollars ($191,000)." Section 5. This Act is effective June 11, 2002.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to amend the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2002. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That section 16 of chapter 3 of the 2001 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS State Penitentiary Operating Expenses, delete "$4,922,325" and insert "$5,215,825". Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. That section 17 of chapter 3 of the 2001 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES Developmental Disabilities Operating Expenses, delete "$21,481,272" and insert "$21,774,772" and delete $40,011,775" and insert "40,598,775". Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 3. The commissioner of the Bureau of Finance and Management shall transfer two hundred fifty thousand dollars ($250,000) of the remaining appropriation from the intergovernmental transfer fund for the operating expenses of the Division of Rehabilitation Services, Department of Human Services, to the operating expenses of the Division of Developmental Disabilities, Department of Human Services, for the home and community based services program. Section 4. Any expenditure authority or cash appropriated by this Act which are unspent at the end of fiscal year 2002 shall be carried over to fiscal year 2003. Section 5. That chapter 3 of the 2001 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: After Section 27, insert: "Section 27A. The state treasurer shall transfer to the general fund from the youth-at-risk fund the sum of three hundred ninety-six thousand dollars ($396,000). Section 27B. The state treasurer shall transfer to the general fund from the people's trust fund the sum of one hundred ninety-one thousand dollars ($191,000)." Section 6. This Act is effective June 11, 2002.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to amend the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2002. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That section 16 of chapter 3 of the 2001 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS State Penitentiary Operating Expenses, delete "$4,922,325" and insert "$5,415,825". Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. That section 17 of chapter 3 of the 2001 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES Developmental Disabilities Operating Expenses, delete "$21,481,272" and insert "$21,974,772" and delete $40,011,775" and insert "40,598,775". Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 3. That section 14 of chapter 3 of the 2001 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: BOARD OF REGENTS South Dakota School of Medicine Personal Services, delete "$9,175,134" and insert "$9,675,134" Section 4. Any expenditure authority or cash appropriated by this Act which are unspent at the end of fiscal year 2002 shall be carried over to fiscal year 2003. Section 5. That chapter 3 of the 2001 Session Laws be amended to read as follows: After Section 27, insert: "Section 27A. The state treasurer shall transfer to the general fund from the youth-at-risk fund the sum of three hundred ninety-six thousand dollars ($396,000). Section 27B. The state treasurer shall transfer to the general fund from the people's trust fund the sum of one hundred ninety-one thousand dollars ($191,000). Section 27C. The state treasurer shall transfer to the general fund from the South Dakota Building Authority the sum of nine hundred thousand dollars ($900,000)." Section 6. This Act is effective June 11, 2002.
